cast.original_title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
cast.overview: A fading actor best known for his portrayal of a popular superhero attempts to mount a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play. As opening night approaches, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career, and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected.
cast.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)

cast.overview: After a botched bank robbery lands his younger brother in prison, Connie Nikas embarks on a twisted odyssey through New York City's underworld to get his brother Nick out of jail.
cast.title: Good Time

details.biography: Craig muMs Grant was born on December 18, 1968 in Bronx, New York, New York, USA. Craig muMs was an actor and writer, known for Dark Water (2005), Side Effects (2013) and Good Time (2017). Craig muMs died on March 24, 2021 in Wilmington, North Carolina, USA.
details.name: Craig muMs Grant
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
